physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 27 x 27, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, right margin, (2) 41 x 50, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (3) 42 x 45, (A) 1 line, no margins, (?), (B) blank, (4) 41 x 17, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin, (B) 1 line, top margin (?), (5) 41 x 22, (A) 7 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (6) 35 x 30, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 25 x 35, (A) 1 line, top right margins, (B) 4 lines, top margins, (8) 41 x 35, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (9) 32 x 14, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (10) 50 x 12, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (11) 37 x 50, (A) 1 line, top left margins, (B) blank, (12) 67 x 42, (A) 3 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (13) 70 x 30, (A) 10 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (14) 75 x 31, (A) 7 lines, left top (?) margins, (B) blank, (15) 62 x 30, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (16) 60 x 48, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank
